entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event where Hagrid and Fleur are present.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, who hears Fleur and Roger fall out of their rosebush.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who gets insulted by Hagrid calling her an 'Alf-giant'.

entities.name: roger
entities.description: Roger is Fleur's partner in the rosebush.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who gets into an argument with Fleur and later walks away from the scene.

relationships.description: Harry hears Fleur and Roger fall out of their rosebush.
Hagrid insults Fleur by calling her an 'Alf-giant'.
